title: Contemporary Stuttgart Apartment Escape near Mercedes-Benz Museum with Rooftop Terrace
description: Known for its lush green spaces, fascinating history and culture, automotive museums and bourgeoning culinary scene, experience Stuttgart's endless wonders from the centrally located Adina Apartment Hotel Stuttgart. This high-end retreat is a stone's throw away from iconic landmarks like the Mercedes-Benz Museum and the Stuttgart State Opera. Savour gourmet delights at the onsite restaurant, or toast to your stay at the rooftop terrace bar - STR barstronomy.

vendor_name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Stuttgart Airport Messe
title: Modern Stuttgart Self-Contained Studios near Airport & Messe Stuttgart
description:
Experience the perfect fusion of convenience and innovation with a stay at this modern aparthotel, ideally situated within minutes of the Stuttgart Airport and the Messe Stuttgart, one of Germany's largest exhibition centres. After a day of business or sightseeing, return to your sleek, fully equipped apartment to relax and recharge. 

Positioned near public transport links, it offers effortless access to the city centre, home to world-renowned museums, leafy parks and heritage architecture. Spend your days discovering Stuttgart, the 'cradle of the automobile', where legends like Mercedes-Benz and Porsche were born. If you wish to discover Stuttgart's vibrant nightlife, then Theodor-Heuss-Strasse has a host of bars and clubs.
location_description: Aparthotel Adagio Access Stuttgart Airport Messe
offer_address: Bertha Benz Platz 5, Leinfelden-Echterdingen, Stuttgart 70771, Germany
